BE.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
BE.description: L'empereur démoniaque Garuda a fait main basse sur la ville. Seuls deux courageux guerriers osent le défier. Jouez en solo ou en coopération, terrassez l'armée de soldats malveillants, de vifs ninjas et de robots terrifiants de Garuda, en utilisant votre main tranchante, vos bombes et vos shurikens. Servez-vous de vos capacités pour vous accrocher aux plateformes mobiles et éviter les pièges mortels. Récupérez des améliorations qui vous aideront tout au long de votre parcours... si vous parvenez à les conserver. Il vous faudra rassembler tout votre talent pour parcourir les 13 niveaux intenses du jeu et punir Garuda !

DE.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
DE.description: Der verrückte Kaiser Garuda hat die Stadt fest im Griff. Nur zwei tapfere Krieger wagen es, ihm zu trotzen. Ob als Einzelspieler oder mit einem Freund im Zweispieler-Modus, du wirst dir mit Messern, Bomben und Shuriken einen Weg durch die brutalen Soldaten, flinken Ninjas und monströsen Roboter bahnen müssen. Nutze deine Fähigkeiten und schwinge dich auf bewegliche Plattformen, springe über todbringende Fallgruben und weiche diabolischen Fallen aus. Sammle Items, die dir gegen deine Gegner einen Vorteil verschaffen – wenn du sie zu deinen Gunsten einsetzen kannst. Du wirst all dein Können brauchen, um die 13 anspruchsvollen Level des Spiels zu durchqueren und Garuda seiner gerechten Strafe zuzuführen!

BG.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
BG.description: Mad emperor Garuda holds the city in his grasp. Only two brave warriors dare to stand against him. Playing solo or co-op with a friend, you'll slice, bomb and shuriken your way through Garuda's army of vicious soldiers, agile ninja and monstrous robots. Use your skills to hang from moving platforms, leap over lethal pitfalls and dodge diabolical traps. Collect deadly power-ups to give yourself an edge – if you can hold on to them. It'll take all of your platforming prowess to navigate the game's 13 intense levels and bring justice to Garuda!

IT.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
IT.description: L'intera città è alla mercé del folle imperatore Garuda. Solo due impavidi guerrieri hanno il coraggio di sfidarlo! In modalità per uno o due giocatori, fatti strada a colpi di lama, bombe e shuriken, sbaragliando un esercito di soldati crudeli, agili ninja e robot terrificanti. Salta e appenditi a piattaforme semoventi, supera con un balzo tranelli mortali ed evita trappole diaboliche. Raccogli le armi sul tuo cammino per meglio affrontare i pericoli che ti attendono. Dimostra le tue abilità superando 13 impegnativi livelli, infine dai a Garuda una lezione di giustizia in tradizionale stile ninja.

EE.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
EE.description: Mad emperor Garuda holds the city in his grasp. Only two brave warriors dare to stand against him. Playing solo or co-op with a friend, you'll slice, bomb and shuriken your way through Garuda's army of vicious soldiers, agile ninja and monstrous robots. Use your skills to hang from moving platforms, leap over lethal pitfalls and dodge diabolical traps. Collect deadly power-ups to give yourself an edge – if you can hold on to them. It'll take all of your platforming prowess to navigate the game's 13 intense levels and bring justice to Garuda!

ES.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
ES.description: La ciudad tiembla a merced del terrible emperador Garuda y tan solo dos valientes guerreros se atreven a desafiarlo. Utiliza tus cuchillas, bombas y shurikens para abrirte paso, solo o con la ayuda de un amigo, a través de las líneas del malvado ejército de Garuda formado por soldados canallas, ágiles ninjas y horribles robots. Utiliza tus habilidades para colgarte de las plataformas móviles, atravesar de un salto los mortales precipicios y evitar diabólicas trampas. Recoge impresionantes mejoras para darte un empujón (con cuidado de no caerte). Tendrás que demostrar toda tu destreza como experto en los juegos de plataformas para completar los 13 niveles y darle su merecido al malvado Garuda.

PT.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
PT.description: A cidade encontra-se à mercê do cruel imperador Garuda e apenas dois valentes guerreiros ninjas se atrevem a fazer-lhe frente. Utiliza as tuas espadas, bombas e shurikens e enfrenta sozinho ou com um amigo o temível exército de Garuda, composto por soldados de elite, ágeis ninjas e robôs monstruosos. Utiliza as tuas habilidades para te pendurares em plataformas em movimento, saltar sobre perigosos fossos e esquivar maliciosas armadilhas. Recolhe power-ups poderosos que te irão ajudar a enfrentar as adversidades que te esperam. Demonstrando toda a tua destreza em jogos de plataformas, supera 13 níveis intensos e dá ao imperador o que ele merece: justiça ninja!

PL.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
PL.description: Mad emperor Garuda holds the city in his grasp. Only two brave warriors dare to stand against him. Playing solo or co-op with a friend, you'll slice, bomb and shuriken your way through Garuda's army of vicious soldiers, agile ninja and monstrous robots. NZ.description: Mad emperor Garuda holds the city in his grasp. Only two brave warriors dare to stand against him. Playing solo or co-op with a friend, you'll slice, bomb and shuriken your way through Garuda's army of vicious soldiers, agile ninja and monstrous robots. NL.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
NL.description: De stad is in de greep van dwaze keizer Garuda. Slechts twee dappere strijders durven weerstand te bieden. Speel alleen of samen met een vriend en baan je al houwend, bommengooiend en werpsterwerpend een weg door het leger van Garuda dat bestaat uit soldaten, lenige ninja’s en monsterlijke robots. Hang aan platformen, spring over dodelijke valkuilen en ontwijk duivelse valstrikken. Verzamel voorwerpen om jezelf een voorsprong te geven. Al je vaardigheden worden op de proef gesteld in de 13 intense levels en tijdens het gevecht met Garuda.

RU.name: Shadow of the Ninja™
RU.description: Безумный император Garuda держит город в страхе, и только два храбрых воина отважились противостоять ему. Играйте в одиночку или вдвоем, освобождайте свой путь от злобных солдат армии императора, проворных ниндзя и чудовищных роботов. Используйте все ваши навыки, чтобы удержаться на движущихся платформах, перепрыгнуть через бездонные пропасти и избежать хитрых ловушек. Смертельно опасные для врагов усиления дадут вам преимущество, так что постарайтесь их не терять. Преодолев 13 напряженных уровней, вы заставите императора поплатиться за содеянное!
